original_story: [mysterious] What if I told you 297 years of our history might be a total fabrication? Some theorists claim the early Middle Ages, from 614 to 911 AD, never actually happened! Historians like Heribert Illig argue this was a deliberate deception, possibly by the Holy Roman Empire to legitimize its rule. Imagine no Charlemagne, no Viking raids—just a blank slate! What’s shocking is that this theory challenges our entire timeline, making you question everything you think you know about history. Crazy, right?
